name: Extreme Deep Sea Fishing!
description:
This is an unfinished fishing game made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 48.

Catch fish in your net, haul them back to the boat, and trade them for upgrades to your submarine.

Controls:

Movement: WASD, arrow keys, or left analogue stick

Launch and release net: Space bar or Controller A

Launch and recall harpoon: Ctrl, or Controller X

Drop dynamite: Shift or Controller Y
